extendedInfo.description: Second Cold War. The New Generation German Warship SCHARNHORST, called âInvictusâ, fights against New Axe forces in an unequal combat.

reviews.title: Proud US Marine Dad
reviews.comment: Really great game! Easy to play! Got to level 6 really fast. One of the best games on the android market!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not save individual levels
reviews.comment: You have to play 5 levels in a row before it will save your progress. Not good!
reviews.author: Scott Kimball

reviews.title: Good graphics...poor performance
reviews.comment: This game reminded me of old pc game... The graphics for game are good... But the game suffers a lot... On many occasion the ship went on same direction even though tilting other way... The buttons also become unresponsive... Probably programming errors... Please rework this then I ll be back to download
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Submarine Crusher (free)
reviews.comment: It\'s an alright game for a free version, but it\'d have to bring a bit more to be an attention hold because it be ones a bit repetative. Visuals are cool. I love I boats myself, I give ya 3 for what it offers. -Shinobi 009
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boat wont move
reviews.comment: Besides the huge ad wich covers most of the lower screen, the boat wont move from the starting position. So it is almost impossible win. Galaxy tab 2 10.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game!
reviews.comment: Keep up the good work!!

reviews.title: Ads block screen.. ..Total crap
reviews.comment: What are these developers thinking?   Ads block the middle of the screen.  Impossible to play.  Using nookdroid.

reviews.title: Super buggy

reviews.title: Ad blocks view
reviews.comment: I don\'t mind playing games with ads until I work out whether it\'s worth buying, but does the ad really have to be enormous and smack bang in the middle of the screen? Uninstalled

reviews.comment: Its a fun game. Im up to level 28 and starting  to get bored Though.  It seems like it could use  something  more.

reviews.title: Its fun i love it

reviews.title: Decent
